page.title: 07Rock Climbing at Nanjizel.
page.content: At both{Carn Boel}to the north and {Carn Les Boel}to the south of the bay there are{rock climbs with routes of {all grades. Rock climbers use the following equipment: { Rucksack,}for carrying everything. { Harness,}for attaching equipment and ropes to the climber. { Rope,}45 metres is the normal length. { Helmet. { Chocks,}metal wedges for jamming in cracks. { Nylon slings,}for fitting to chocks. { Karabinas,}snap-links for joining ropes together. { Guide book,}to the climbs. The local centre for climbers is at {Bosigran}Count House,{north of Pendeen {on the road to St. Ives
